title: First Round Capital Portfolio
name: First Round Capital Portfolio
description:
A Map by Jkopelman

A listing of First Round Capital's Portfolio Companies

properties.name: 1-800-FREE411
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman8 new england executive park, burlington, maJingle Networks Inc - provider of 1-800-FREE411

properties.name: Aggregate Knowledge, Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman146 Beverly Street, Mountain View CAAggregate Knowledge was created to deliver the best content to people based on the aggregate behavior of everyone who has gone before them. We think that the wisdom of crowds can help people get at the best of all the information that\'s out there.

properties.name: Aster Data Systems, Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman3000 Bridge Parkway, Redwood Shores CA 94065Aster Data Systems is a new company building high-performance, super-scalable, and affordable data analytics solutions for the enterprise. Based in Silicon Valley, Aster Data Systems was founded by three Ph.D. students from the Computer Science Department at Stanford University and backed by some of the Valley\'s famous investors. The company is currently in stealth mode.

properties.name: Authernative, Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman201 Redwood Shores Parkway Redwood City, CA 94065The Authentication Alternative. Authernative\'s products AuthGuard™ and PassEnabler™ allow enterprises to expand rusted relationships with users, customers, partners, and suppliers by ensuring secure access to mission-critical applications, information, resources, data, networks, and transactions.

properties.name: Bazaarvoice, Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman115 Wild Basin Rd S Austin TX 78746Bazaarvoice develops outsourced technology, services, analytics, and expertise to encourage and harness word of mouth marketing and bring it closer to a company\'s brand and customer experience. Other investors include Austin Ventures.

properties.name: Browster, Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman225 Bush St. #480 San Francisco, CA 94104Browster, Inc. is a premier provider of search and browsing enhancement technology. Their breakthrough product, Browster, is a free Internet Explorer and Firefox plugin which can cut in half the time it takes to browse through search results and other lists of links. Other investors include Advanced Technology Venture (ATV), Vanguard Ventures, Gabriel Ventures, and Saints Ventures.

properties.name: CEInteractive, Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman66 Witherspoon St. Princeton, New Jersey 08542CEInteractive provides innovative solutions to the consumer electronics industry that help reduce product returns, increase accessory attachment rates, and improve the customer experience. CEI\'s solutions provide product support assistance at every touch point, supporting retailers, manufacturers, and third party service providers.

properties.name: Digital Railroad
properties.description: Posted by JkopelmanNew York NYDigital Railroad is the leading provider of Web-based application services for the professional photography industry. Digital Railroad\'s unique, comprehensive suite of online services transforms the way photographers and agencies manage, market, and sell images to photo buyers worldwide. Other investors include Venrock Associates and Morgenthaler Ventures.

properties.name: InBoxer, Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman200 Baker Avenue, Suite 101 Concord, MA 01742Bad email is bad business. A slip of the finger or a moment of poor judgment can lead to costly lawsuits, time consuming investigations, confidential information loss, or damage to your reputation. The InBoxer Anti-Risk Appliance, the world\'s first easy-to-use, broad-based anti-risk appliance, helps you protect intellectual property, maintain customer data privacy, demonstrate compliance, and manage inappropriate employee behavior.

properties.name: Krugle
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman200 Middlefield Road, Suite 201 Menlo Park, CA 94025Krugle helps 15M+ developers quickly find the code & answers they need to solve development problems. In the process, Krugle quickly becomes an invaluable tool for developers, saving them time and money, and improving the quality of their code. Other investors include Emergence Capital Partners and Omidyar Network.

properties.name: Mi5 Networks, Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman1267 Borregas Avenue Sunnyvale CA 94089Mi5 Networks produces a family of best-of-breed Anti-Spyware security appliances. Mi5\'s Enterprise Spygate appliances utilize a multi-layered spyware prevention architecture that delivers the most comprehensive protection, lowest false positive rates, and best performance available. Mi5 Networks has secured its Series A funding from its management team, Brightmail founder Sunil Paul and Brightmail angel investors Ron Conway, Mark Pincus and Mike Homer.

properties.name: Odeo
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman164 South Park St, San Francisco, CA 94107, USAOdeo was founded in 2004 to provide a simple and innovative way to record and share audio. Users can record audio and then share it with their Odeo contacts, by email, or by placing it in a Channel for all the world to hear. Audio from Odeo can be downloaded to desktops, iPods, and mp3 players. The funding round was led by Charles River Ventures with participation from Amicus Ventures and a substantial number of angel investors including Mitch Kapor, Joe Kraus, Tim O\'Reilly, Ron Conway, Don Hutchinson, Dave Pell, Mike Maples, Francesco Caio, Barbara Poggiali, Emanuele Angelidis, James Hong, and Ed Zschau.

properties.name: Portaga
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman445 Hamilton Avenue, Suite 1102, White Plains, NY 10601The Portaga Travel Manager connects Microsoft Outlook directly to travel providers. Through a partnership with Sabre, this application lets you book your flights, hotel and car rentals directly from your calendar.

properties.name: Pre-Commerce
properties.description: Posted by JkopelmanPO BOX 185, Durham PA 18039The Pre-Commerce Group is an online marketing agency. Smart companies hire them to drive more clients to their web sites and increase the profitability of these visitors. The Pre-Commerce Group has deep experience with all the techniques and technologies that are making online commerce thrive.

properties.name: Riya.com (Ojos, Inc.)
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman203 Redwood Shores Parkway, #210 Redwood City, CA 94065Company founder Munjal Shah, says that Ojos was built "because I found I had 31,246 photos all named DSC0009.jpg." In other words, this startup is creating a new way to search and organize photos. The company has hired a team of Stanford facial recognition researchers and has built a product that will automatically perform face and text recognition. Other investors include Bay Partners, Leapfrog Ventures, and BlueRun Ventures.

properties.name: Root Markets
properties.description: Posted by JerryThe Company

properties.name: Satori Labs
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman5 Erba Lane, Suite E, Scotts Valley, CA 95066Satori Labs, Inc. is a leader in mobile, digital pen and paper-based mobile forms automation solutions for healthcare. Satori Labs develops next-generation digital pen and paper solutions for forms automation. The Company\'s products automatically convert handwritten information into digital data.

properties.name: Snapcentric
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman1855 South Grant Street, San Mateo, CA 94402User names and passwords are no longer enough to validate the true identity of a user, yet hardened key approaches are expensive and difficult to maintain. Snapcentric Verify™ provides a real-time user verification and transaction monitoring system for fighting identity theft and application fraud. Rather than focusing on trying to stop the spread of false emails and web-sites, Snapcentric provides protection at the point where it matters most - the online site.

properties.name: The MediaTile Company
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman5900 Butler Lane Scotts Valley, CA 95066MediaTile is the world\'s first provider of cellular digital signage networks. The MediaTile solution provides a revolutionary breakthrough in deploying and managing digital signage and narrowcasting networks. MediaTile eliminates the number one barrier to implementing digital signage: costly and complex on-site IT infrastructure.

properties.name: UGOBE
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman5900 Hollis Street, Suite T2, Emeryville, California 94608UGOBE develops and markets revolutionary robotic technology that transforms inanimate objects into lifelike creatures that exhibit stunning, organic movement and dynamic behaviors. UGOBE\'s groundbreaking line of robotic creatures called Life Forms, promise to inspire and entertain the child in all of us. Pleo, Ugobe\'s first Life Form, will be available in stores Fall of 2006, in time for the holidays and will MSRP for under 00.00. Ugobe\'s team of robotics experts, animators, technologists, scientists, biologists and programmers are led by Furby-creator, Caleb Chung, one of the most successful and respected toy creators in the 5 billion U.S. toy industry.

properties.name: VideoEgg
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman300 Brannan St. #601, San Francisco, CA 94107VideoEgg, Inc. was created to make online video posting truly easy. All across the web we see everyday internet users struggling with a complex mix of video formats, editing software, and players when they try to put video online. The VideoEgg Publisher, will revolutionize the way videos are captured, edited, and published - removing technical complexity and empowering communities across the web with easy video publishing tools. Other investors include August Capital.

properties.name: YackPack
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman418 Aviation Blvd., Suite F, Santa Rosa, California 95403YackPack combines the richness of voice communication with the convenience and simplicity of email, allowing even non-technical people to strengthen connections with those closest to them. Co-investors include Omidyar Network, Esther Dyson, Ron Conway, Terry WInograd and other angel investors.

properties.name: biggerBoat
properties.description: Posted by Jkopelman400 S. Beverly Drive Beverly Hills, CA 90212 BiggerBoat is the Internet\'s most comprehensive, entertainment industry-specific search engine delivering cross-category, cross-format, and cross-retailer search results to online entertainment consumers. Other investors include DFJ Zone Ventures.
